title: Stitch! The Movie
genres: Comedy, Adventure, Family, Animation, Science Fiction
overview: The continuing adventures of Lilo, a little Hawaiian girl, and Stitch, the galaxy's most-wanted extraterrestrial. Stitch, Pleakley, and Dr. Jumba are all part of the household now, but what Lilo and Stitch don't know is that Dr. Jumba brought his other alien "experiments" to Hawai ªi as well.
